description: Kasha is simple and traditional Ukrainian comfort food made with toasted buckwheat groats. it can be enjoyed with sweet or savoury mix ins and is naturally gluten free.
keywords: Grain salad,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Kasha with Mushrooms & Onions Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cups chicken stock, made with 1 stock cube, hot

recipeInstructions.text: Place the buckwheat groats in a large, dry pan on medium heat and toast for 4-5 minutes, shaking often. Pour into a bowl and add the egg. Mix well to coat.
Tip the buckwheat and egg mix into the same frying pan on medium low heat and cook for a couple of minutes until the egg is cooked, using a wooden spoon to separate the groats.
Pour over the chicken stock and cook for 20-25 minutes until the liquid has been absorbed and the groats are tender.
Heat the oil in a pan on medium high heat and cook the onion for 5 minutes, stir in the mushrooms and cook for 5 more minutes. Stir the onion and mushroom mix through the cooked buckwheat and serve.
